A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: so many plot holes...so many bad decisions (that would've been good if saved for the trilogy finale)...displaced awkward comedy...so much wasted time...this director saw a chance to make a name for himself by \"burning SW to the ground\" and disregarded everything & everyone else to do so. The Force Awakens was a SW movie made by a SW fan for everyone...Rogue One was a SW movie made by a SW fan for SW fans...The Last Jedi was a SW movie made by someone who cared more about himself than SW or SW fans or anyone else.
